channel.title: projects on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current researches are: Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Gaussian mixture model with an extended ultrametric covariance structure the maximum likelihood estimation of a Gaussian Mixture Model where the covariance structure is modeled according to an extended ultrametric covariance matrix, the model extends the concepts and definitions of ultrametric matrix in order to model generic covariance structure. (Revision requested) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.
